name: host-logging
description: Codebase for implementing a host function via WebAssembly with jco

scripts.build: jco componentize component.js --wit wit --world-name component --out component.wasm --disable all
scripts.transpile: jco transpile component.wasm --map 'wasi:logging/logging=./log-host.js' -o dist/transpiled; cp log-host.js dist/transpiled
scripts.all: npm run build; npm run transpile; npm run transpiled-js
